definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: file. The first group of settings in this file are the global cache settings.
sentences.chinese: 這個文件中的第一組設置是全局性的高速緩存設置。

sentences.english: In your Web browser's cache are the most recent Web files that you have downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 網頁瀏覽器的高速緩存區裏有你最近下載的網頁文件。

sentences.english: You can design a cache to have a maximum size.
sentences.chinese: 您可以設計一個高速緩存來擁有一個最大的存儲量。

sentences.english: Deactivates platform plug-in registry cache loading optimization.
sentences.chinese: 取消激活裝入優化的平臺插件註冊表高速緩存。

sentences.english: The pivot point is one place where you can insert your cache.
sentences.chinese: 這個軸心點是一個您可以插入高速緩存的地方。

sentences.english: In this instance, the cache system is of the self-pruning variety.
sentences.chinese: 在這個實例中，高速緩存系統是自清除種類的。

sentences.english: If it is in the cache, throw an error.
sentences.chinese: 如果它在高速緩存中，則拋出一個錯誤。

sentences.english: This architecture lets you decide at the time of deployment if you will use caching.
sentences.chinese: 這個體系結構讓您在部署時決定是否使用高速緩存。

sentences.english: This article focuses on the command caching portion of this functionality.
sentences.chinese: 本文集中討論了這項功能的命令高速緩存部分。

sentences.english: There are a number of different caches for various response modules.
sentences.chinese: 有許多不同類型的高速緩存用於多種響應模塊。

sentences.english: The cache item is stored when a page is requested.
sentences.chinese: 當請求一個頁面時將存儲高速緩存條目。

sentences.english: You should also monitor the efficiency of caching.
sentences.chinese: 您還應該監視高速緩存的效率。
更換回寫高速緩存模塊。

sentences.english: The write-back cache batteries are high energy devices.
sentences.chinese: 回寫高速緩存電池是高能量設備。

sentences.english: In this way the number of cache lines read in are reduced.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，被讀入的高速緩存線路的數量就減少了。

sentences.english: Next, the cache monitor must be mapped to a virtual host.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，必須將高速緩存監控器映射到虛擬主機。
